meanings.definition: A small beard that grows below the chin and typically does not include hair on the cheeks.
meanings.sent1: He admired the goatees of the wise old man.
meanings.sent2: The rock star sported stylish goatees during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The goatees on the goats made them look quite dapper.
meanings.sent4: In the crowd, his goatees stood out like tiny flags.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted portraits with intricate goatees on each subject.

meanings.definition: The plural form of goatee, referring to multiple small beards grown below the chin.
meanings.sent1: The barbershop specialized in trimming goatees for all ages.
meanings.sent2: At the party, there were various goatees of different styles.
meanings.sent3: The goatees in the mirror seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: Among the crowd, the goatees formed a unique pattern.
meanings.sent5: The actors in the play all wore matching goatees for their roles.
